unnormalised: Arre baba, tor dekhli tumhi hospitalachi bill? ₹2500 fakt consultationak! Ani magir tanne ₹500 ghetle ek injectionak, vichar kara! Mhaje nanajincho medical record number HM/2023/04/789, ani tedna punn tanne taka history melloi na. Doctor mhonnle taka anink ek checkup lagta 3 mhoinneani, kiteak ₹1500 lagtele. Total bill aslem ₹5000! Doctors aizkalche, haina?
normalised: Arre baba, tumi tem hospital-achem bill polleilem? Rupaai don hazaar panchshe fakt consultation-ak! Ani magir tanni rupai panchshe ekeka injection-ak lavle, kalpna kar! Mhoje nanaji-che medical record number H-M slash don hazaar tevis slash zero char slash saat she ainshiya navad asaa, ani tenntun legit, tankam tachi history mell'li naa. Doctor mhonnlle tanka tin mhoineani ankhi ek checkup zai, ani taka anik rupai ek hazaar panchshe lagtele. Total bill rupai panch hazaar aslem! Doctors aizkaalche, eh?
text: Arre baba, tor dekhli tumhi hospitalachi bill? ₹2500 fakt consultationak! Ani magir tanne ₹500 ghetle ek injectionak, vichar kara! Mhaje nanajincho medical record number HM/2023/04/789, ani tedna punn tanne taka history melloi na. Doctor mhonnle taka anink ek checkup lagta 3 mhoinneani, kiteak ₹1500 lagtele. Total bill aslem ₹5000! Doctors aizkalche, haina?
